label: Microsoft R Server (Standalone) on Windows Server 2012 R2
displayName: Microsoft R Server (Standalone) on Windows Server 2012 R2
summary: Enterprise version of SQL Server 2016 with Microsoft R Server (Standalone).
description: This image of SQL Server 2016 Enterprise edition has been pre-configured with Microsoft R Server (Standalone) installation. Microsoft R Server (Standalone) provides the option to develop high performance R solutions on Windows while connecting to the database or data source of your choice. This image is charged exactly like SQL Server 2016 Enterprise image. For production workloads we recommend that you use a virtual machine size of DS4 or higher.
